description: Situated in La Plaine, a village near Geneva, Switzerland(Location Map), AQUA+TECH Specialties S.A. was incorporated in November 1997 with the intent to develop, produce and sell materials for application in water treatment.  More specifically, polymeric flocculants (a polymer is a “molecule of many parts” with the most typical example being plastics) are used to separate solid-based impurities from aqueous suspensions such as are contacted in municipal sewage as well as chemical processes and mining. Product development has proceeded rapidly with five key patents filed on inverse-emulsions as well as structured powders and others issued (US Patent 6,294,622).  A pilot plant is fully functional and permits industrial scale trials for several weeks with investment returns permitting rapid installation and scale-up.  AQUA+TECH’S facilities include a production capacity of 3,000 tons per year as well as a 100 kg rapid prototyping facility suitable for the preparation of customized batches for clients. Research and Development includes projects on new ionic monomers as well as novel dispersants for heterophase polymerizations.

They are inviting the contribution of manuscripts that present new techniques or give an overview of existing experimental, computational or theoretical methods in the field of applied rheology. The contributions should be at a review level with a strong tie to present or future applications as well as understandable to the non-researcher. Applied Rheology also serves as the newsletter for several rheological societies worldwide.

Furthermore, b-cube offers assistance in analyzing three-dimensional data of any external imaging source.

The company was founded in 2008 by Dr. Thomas Kohler, Dr. Martin Stauber, and Prof. Dr. Ralph Müller. During incubation time, b-cube was hosted by its mother institute, the Institute for Biomechanics at the ETH Zürich. This close link was a crucial factor for a successful setup of of this young company. In June 2010, b-cube moved to the Bio-Technopark in Schlieren-Zürich. Advanced Technology Lawyers is a legal consulting firm that meets the specific needs of companies of all sizes that are active in the new technology sector. 

Their story is that of the natural birth of a "highly specialized law firm" capable of supporting the actors of the new economy. 
 
Their consultants are "business experts", experienced in the technical specificities and realities of the new technologies market. 

Their organization, spread over technological centers, meets the requirements of an experienced and coherent approach that converges law and technology.
  
Their method of work draws its sources in new technologies to offer a local service that meets the requirements of speed and confidentiality. 

Their strategy is to build a lasting partnership with our customers.
short_description: Advanced Technology Lawyers is a legal consulting firm.

name: Attratech
description:
Attratech is a technical development company in the field of information technology and electronics.

The main activity of Attratech is the execution of mandates for companies.

From the idea, brought by the customer, they develop functional diagrams and electrical schematics, they take care of the routing and assembly and they finish with the programming and the test phase to get to the prototype of the card electronic.

Through partner companies they also provide other services, such as the creation of electronic devices and the industrialization of products.
short_description: Attratech is a technical development company in the field of information technology and electronics.

description: Spyco is engaged in design and development industrialization & commercialization of electronic systems and custom microsystems recording the cause of deviations in the manufacture, storage and transport of risky product.

name: Attrackting
description:
Attrackting wants to make people's lives easier and safer thanks to intelligent everyday equipment. Carried on the body of pets and humans or attached to valuable mobile objects, their intelligent products will gradually replace and complement the objects in their lives!

After intensive months of planning and conception as well as many clarifications, attrackting AG was born in March 2013 in Biel / Bienne.
short_description: Attrackting aims to make people’s lives easier and more secure using intelligent and interactive everyday devices.

name: Atracsys
description:
Atracsys was established in 2004, capitalizing years of research at the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Lausanne (EPFL). Its name is an acronym for Advanced Tracking Systems, and that's what Atracsys started out with: developing high-precision optical measurement solutions for medical surgery. In 2007, upon an increasing demand to apply its technological optical expertise in touchless interaction and multi-touch systems, Atracsys created a new department called Interactive Solutions. Both departments Measurement Solutions and Interactive Solutions grew in parallel and a decade later, in January 2017, the company was officially split in two: 

Atracsys LLC, dedicated to the Measurement Solutions business. 

Atracsys Interactive SA, dedicated to the Interactive Solutions business.
short_description: Atracsys focuses on delivering turn-key solutions.

name: Atlas Agro
description:
Atlas Agro is a swiss public limited company assembling internationally recognized experts in the field of integrated crop management and biological protection.

Atlas Agro is a Spin-off of the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology, Zurich (ETH).

Atlas Agro is membre of the International Biocontrol Manufactures Association IBMA
short_description: Atlas Agro is focus on developing and marketing sustainable solutions for crop protection, forestry, apiculture and public hygiene.

name: ADR AC GmbH
description:
ADR-AC has longtime expertise in drug hypersensitivity research. In case of adverse drug reactions during pre-clinical stages, phase I - III clinical trials or in post-marketing stages, ADR-AC offers defined risk assessment to analyze and evaluate the immune-stimulatory potential of culprit substances. Our know-how in the field of small chemical molecules as well as biologicals, eg therapeutic proteins and monoclonal antibodies.

ADR-AC has profound expertise in performing in vitro experiments based on human immune cells. Upon your request ADR-AC will propose a panel of tests designed to reveal the immunogenic potential of your drug.
short_description: ADR AC GmbH Offer's analysis and consulting for presumable drug.

name: Preclin Consulting
description: Preclin Consulting is in the fields of anatomy, toxicology and toxicological pathology. May also offer other services in these and other areas and trade in goods or intellectual property, perform all commercial, financial and other activities related to the purpose of the company, acquire, manage and sell real estate, as well as to companies with the same or similar rights similar purpose at home and abroad and establish branches.
short_description: Preclin Consulting is in the fields of anatomy, toxicology and toxicological pathology.

name: Atlas photonics
description:
Atlas photonics is specialized in the design, manufacturing and sale of photochemistry related equipment. Its core product is the new LED-based LUMOS® multi-wavelength monochromatic benchtop light source.

Atlas Photonics provides small, reliable and cost-effective benchtop UV sources. Its core technology relies on high-power UV-LED, particularly well-suited for investigative-scale photochemical reactions (0-50 mg).

Atlas Photonics will supply the tools you need for your photochemistry: 
Quartz glassware, custom-made reactors and equipment, UV-LED's.

The Atlas Photonics consulting service assists you in the development of your photochemistry applications, from the chemistry or the technological side.
short_description: Atlas photonics is specialized in the design, manufacturing and sale of photochemistry related equipment.

name: Adoptics
description:
Adoptics is a private medical device company focused on developing a novel accommodating intraocular lens (AIOL) to treat cataract and presbyopia.

Cataract is a clouding of the eye’s crystalline lens and Presbyopia is a vision condition in which the patient looses the ability to focus on close objects. It is a natural part of the aging process of the eye and affects most of us over 40 years of age.

Adoptics AIOL is based on a proprietary technology that uses a novel optical system to focus light on the retina. The nature of this unique refractive system allows the implant to mimic the natural accommodation process of a young eye. Adoptics AIOL will be implanted through a small incision using the same surgical technique as conventional intraocular lenses and will restore youthful vision to cataract and presbyopic patients.
short_description: Adoptics is a private medical device company.

name: Ad Insertion Platform
description:
Ad Insertion Platform (AIP) is a company active in Digital TV and Over The Top (OTT) services since 2007.

They provide broadcast Ad Insertion and OTT server-side Dynamic Ad Insertion services and solutions to major TV Stations, content providers and Ad Sales Houses.

They have a team experienced in Digital TV (broadcast, IPTV and OTT), Ad & Content Insertion (DTV and Online Advertising) and delivery of live TV Stations and On-Demand services over the Internet.
short_description: Ad Insertion Platform (AIP) provides Ad Insertion solution for OTT and broadcast environment as well as OTT Head-End services.

name: JB Engineering
description:
Jb Engineering  sees itself as  your partner in the field of project management and automation technology . The name stands for  innovation, ideas and individual solutions  in the field of automation technology. Project management stands for effective support of  your projects. Even with unconventional tasks they are at your disposal.

 

Complete, innovative project management considers every interface. Scheduling, according to your specifications and a clear implementation of the task lead to a  safe and smooth future production process . In doing so, they also consider the  requirement of service and maintenance  and of course the  requirements of the quality department .

 

Another focus of the company is the topic around the  qualification and validation of production plants in the field of automation technology . - They handle all quality-related tasks for you - from the preparation of a  functional  description - the assessment of possible risks ( risk analysis , FMEA) -  FAT  and  SAT  -  specifications and planning  - preparation of specification documents for  master qualification plan ,  qualification  plan - and  report , as well as the preparation the DQ, IQ, OQ and Assistance in the PQ.
short_description: JB Engineering providing services in the field of engineering such as analysis, consulting planning.

name: Adhoco AG
description:
Ad aptive Ho me Co ntrol - with its foundation in 2004, this objective has been manifested on behalf of Adhoco AG. For the company, Adaptive Home Control has always stood for comfort, control and security in the modern home.

About ten years later, this goal was decidedly expanded. As a result of climate change, national and international measures to reduce CO² and interesting incentives in the ownership of commercial buildings by foundations, Adhoco AG has decided to adapt its corporate concept to the spirit of the times. The new goal: Adaptive Building Control.

With the extended focus, companies, hotels, schools and other owners of commercial buildings now have the opportunity to equip their buildings with the intelligent heating control system  Adhoco nomy ™.

Adhoco nomy ™ is based on wireless communication - more specifically radio - and the international patent AHA (Adaptive Home Automation), a self-learning technology. Our system is thus able to learn and later predict when someone is in the room and to heat accordingly.

Since 2015, Adhoco has been using the EnOcean radio system, whose actuators, sensors and system devices draw the energy they need from the environment on the basis of energy harvesting. In addition, the system offers the advantages of achieving significantly longer ranges and reducing the energy consumption of the individual components.

With this step, Adhoco AG created the conditions to be able to offer individual components as well as systems such as Adhoconomy ™ in commercial and residential construction.
short_description: Adhoco are specialists in the field of intelligent building automation.

name: Proxipel
description:
Proxipel is an innovative concept for the production of pellets. It consists of a pellet production line mounted on a truck trailer. Proxipel can move to granulate biomass wherever it is.

This unit also makes it possible to transform the residues of many types of woody biomass into pellets.
short_description: Proxipel SA is a company specialized in the development and marketing of mobile pelletizing units.

name: Crypto Finance
description: Crypto Finance AG is a financial technology company founded in June 2017. The company provides blockchain-related services through its three divisions Asset Management, Brokerage and Storage. The aim of Crypto Finance AG is to facilitate the implementation of blockchain technology in the global economy through a range of high quality financial services. Crypto Finance AG is based in Zug in the Crypto Valley, one of the world’s densest clusters of crypto economic companies and innovative organizations that utilize blockchain technology.
short_description: Crypto Finance facilitates blockchain technology implementation in the global economy through a range of financial services.

name: Promonitor
description:
ProMonitor is a provider of market-leading business IT solutions and services, in the area of IT Security, Risk management and IT-Governance (GRC), addressing the needs of enterprises in the banking, insurance and other industries.

Together with their best-of-breed partners' solutions, they enable customers to manage operational risks, safeguard against internal fraud, detect and prevent unauthorized access to critical data and applications, while providing full a audit trail and ensuring compliance with regulations.

These award-winning solutions currently serve over 500 financial companies and enterprises around the world including over 20 of the world's top 50 banks including banks in Switzerland.

The end result is helping enterprises to reduce financial losses, protect their brand and reputation, ensure regulatory compliance, and achieve lower the costs of operations and IT.
short_description: ProMonitor is a provider of market-leading business IT solutions and services.

name: Adeya
description: Adeya SA, founded in 2007 in Geneva and currently based in Morges, is a Swiss company that combines an international team of software experts, telecom engineers, and security specialists. With our fully in-house technical teams, we provide secure mobile government and enterprise collaboration solutions since the earliest days of the smartphones.
short_description: Adeya is a Swiss company that combines an international team of software experts, telecom engineers, and security specialists.

name: Pristem
description:
Pristem is an international company which offers its customers access to world-class medical technologies specifically designed for their unique environments.

Swiss quality and innovation are combined in their pioneering approach in order to open new global markets and address major Global Health issues, starting with the lack of access to medical imaging for two thirds of humanity.

Pristem has a Global reach and the client proximity required to maximize impact in a sustainable and scalable way.
short_description: Pristem is a swiss medtech company providing robust, cost-effective, easy and safe medical systems, designed for primary health care.

description:
Presspectrum Technologies is a technology startup founded in 2013 and based in Switzerland and London. They develop machine learning and natural language processing technologies for digital media and e-commerce.

Some of the most prominent national and international names in digital media and e-commerce are amongst their customers.
short_description: Presspectrum Technologies is a startup developing next-generation data analysis technologies for media and e-commerce.

Spiralps has developed a tasty natural soft drink, containing microalgae, Alps herbs extracts and organic-fruits to combine benefits of all raw materials.

name: ADD Drug Delivery Technologies AG
description:
At ADD Technologies, They focus on pharmaceutical and analytical development of formulations and manufacturing processes using our modern laboratory facilities closely located to the Basle Institute of Technology.

ADD Technologies transfers this know-how to the facilities of allied production partners or to preferred production partners of the customers.

The management of the company has a background of at least 10 years experience in international pharmaceutical development obtained at highly-reputed companies of the pharmaceutical industry in Basle. Together with experienced board members and our scientific advisory board, ADD Technologies is able to offer pharmaceutical development of outstanding quality.

ADD Technologies offers clients highly professional, flexible and cost-effective performance in the technical development of innovative and conventional sterile and solid dosage formulations for New Chemical Entities as well as generic compounds from the prototype development phase to production of clinical material and commercial production. ADD Technologies also supplies the necessary technical documentation for our customer's registration package and ensures compliance with regulatory requirements during clinical production, scale-up, and introductory production campaigns.

ADD Technologies strives to develop dosage forms and corresponding manufacturing processes which will enable fast introduction of the product to the market at economically acceptable production costs.
short_description: ADD Technologies focus is on pharmaceutical and analytical development of formulations and manufacturing processes

name: Photrack
description:
The company photrack AG was founded as an ETH Spin-off in January 2012 by Dr. Beat Lüthi. Beat Lüthi was associated with IfU, the Institute of environmental engineering at ETH Zürich. The hydromechanics group of IfU, now led by board member Prof. Markus Holzner, is specialized in turbulent flows and 3D particle tracking velocimetry.

Over the last five years photrack has developed a fully automatic webcam based river discharge measurement system in collaboration with the hydrological section of the Federal Office for the Environment (FOEN). In collaboration with FOEN, ETH, Hydrosolution and SDC the system has become mobile and can now also be operated with smartphones.
short_description: Photrack is all about measuring flows with images.

name: Pessoss Services
description: The purpose of the company is the development, operation and marketing of software, products and services in the field of electronic data transmission and processing as well as the provision of consulting services in this field. Furthermore, the purpose also includes all activities that serve the promotion of the main purpose; In particular, the Company may establish branches or agencies at home and abroad, establish or acquire similar or related companies, participate in the same or similar companies, enter into financial transactions of any kind on its own account or in trust, and acquire, manage and sell real estate. The Company may acquire, hold and dispose of patents, copyrights, trademarks, other intellectual property rights and licenses of any kind. The Company may grant loans or other funding to its direct or indirect parent companies and their direct or indirect subsidiaries, whether or not for consideration, free of charge, and may pledge collateral of any kind to the liabilities of such other companies, including by way of liens on Company assets or fiduciary transfers of assets of the Company, or by means of guarantees of any kind.
short_description: Pessoss Services are uses for project management and consulting.

name: ACTIS
description:
ACTIS is an official spin-off organisation of the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH Zurich), created in 2009 to continue delivering the successful “Youth Encounter on Sustainability (YES)” program. YES is a pioneering concept in education for sustainable development targeted to university students and young professionals. Since the year 2000, over 35 courses have been delivered all around the world, bringing together motivated and like minded young leaders and equipping them with the skills and knowledge necessary to address global challenges. A total of 1’200 youth from over 110 different countries have been trained in the program and form the active YES Alumni Network.

ACTIS continues to develop and deliver new courses on different topics of sustainability around the world. Have a look at the upcoming courses and apply today to take part in a once in a lifetime experience!
short_description: ACTIS is created in 2009 to continue delivering the successful “Youth Encounter on Sustainability (YES)” program.

name: Adamant Technologies
description:
Adamant Technologies SA is a company active in the field of Diamond Coating Technology applied to various applications. The main one is the water treatment market for which Adamant Technologies produces Adamant®-Electrodes and systems (DiaCell®-Technology). The company is also active for the water process monitoring markets with innovative sensors and offers CVD-diamond coating services for customized intrinsic- or doped-diamond-coated pieces.

 Adamant Technologies, based in Neuchâtel area in Switzerland, is a spin-off company of CSEM, Centre Suisse d’Electronique et de Microtechnique S.A. Its headquarter and facility are located in Neode building in La Chaux-de-Fonds.
short_description: Adamant Technologies SA is a company active in the field of Diamond Coating Technology.

name: Acctron
description:
Acctron is specialized in innovative methods for surface and material testing and documentation.

The core competences include determination of functional properties of materials, e.g. in-situ micro-tribology with high local resolution, abrasion, total deformation, hardness, scratch resistance, as well as human-physiological effects like tactile and visual appearance.

Acctron operates its own independent laboratory at the Technology Centre of the Federal Institute of Materials Science & Technology (EMPA) in St.Gallen.
short_description: Acctron is specialized in innovative methods for surface and material testing and documentation.
